entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Welland

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
